ClassDesc: Constants for use by watch face configuration activities. To register a configuration activity for a watch face, add a <meta-data> entry to the watch face component in its Android Manifest file with an intent action to be fired to start the activity. The following meta-data will register the com.example.watchface.CONFIG_DIGITAL action to be started when configuring a watch face on the wearable device: To register a configuration activity to be started on a companion phone, add the following alternative meta-data entry to the watch face component: The activity should have an intent filter which lists the action specified in the meta-data block above, in addition to the two categories present in the following example: For phone side configuration activities, substitute the category com.google.android.wearable.watchface.category.COMPANION_CONFIGURATION for com.google.android.wearable.watchface.category.WEARABLE_CONFIGURATION.
